name: Kokopelli's Melodies
description:
------------------------------

Story :

------------------------------

We lead Kokopelli, a god of Native American mythology who uses his flute to create supernatural events such as: the appearance of rain, sowing seeds or even blowing life. 

From the cliff on which he is installed, he decided to take care of a village using his powers so that it prospers as long as possible.

------------------------------

Controls :

------------------------------

Use your flute :

  • Rain

Input : 5 -> 1 -> 4

  • Love

Input : 4 -> 5 -> 2

  • Sun

Input : 3 -> 2 -> 5

  • Health

Input : 1 -> 4 -> 2
